patthana19.8:4.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.8:4.2: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.8:4.3: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.8:5.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.8:5.2: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.8:5.3: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.8:6.1: Nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.8:6.2: Nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana19.8:7.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate aṭṭhārasa.
